OOC: Sorry if any attacks on my 2 chars are ignored, as you know, I just go=
t my email working today, and I recieved 1026 emails, so I simply just dele=
ted them so I'm trying to get everyone to help me learn what's going on so =
far.  

::Quatro/Slaughter::

     Quatro knew that bots would be coming af=
ter him, he could sense that the Decepticons had come back.  Still in the v=
entilation system, he kept crawling around.  Soon, he would have to bust ou=
t, and try to escape the Dark Avian.  Alive.  He continued crawling cautiou=
sly, trying to keep his stealth up.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~
        Slaughter had heard more Decepticons come back.  This was exce=
llent!  Yet, very dangerous.  Slaughter licked his lips, if he had any, wit=
h his big, long, slimy tongue.  Slime and saliva dripped from it, as well a=
s just slime dripping from his whole body.

        "I'M HUNGRY!!  RAAH!" S=
laughter yelled in rage, snapping his pincirs a couple times.

        The =
tall, freak mutant paced his way quickly around the Decepticon base(inside)=
, looking for something to eat(in other words, something to kill).
